s-1.ptxt: REMOVE NO. 1 ULTRASONIC SENSOR (w/ TOYOTA Parking Assist-sensor System)

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedure to remove the No. 1 ultrasonic sensor on the other side.

s2.ptxt: While pushing down on the lever with a finger to release the claw on the top of the sensor, detach the claw on the other side to remove the No. 1 ultrasonic sensor.

atten4.ptxt: The type of claw on the top and the type of claw on the bottom of the sensor are different. Observe the claws carefully before removing the sensor.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE NO. 1 ULTRASONIC SENSOR RETAINER (w/ TOYOTA Parking Assist-sensor System)

s2.ptxt: Detach the 2 claws and remove the No. 1 ultrasonic sensor retainer from the rear bumper cover.
Detach the guide and remove the reflex reflector.

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedure described for the LH side.
